H0.text: Energy from the Sun causes ocean water to evaporate in the water cycle.

H1.text: Energy from ocean waves causes ocean water to evaporate in the water cycle.

H2.text: Energy from Earth's rotation causes ocean water to evaporate in the water cycle.

H3.text: Energy from Earth's moon causes ocean water to evaporate in the water cycle.

A4.text: Solar radiation is absorbed by the Earth's land surface, oceans – which cover about 71% of the globe – and atmosphere.
